name: Candyfactory Ludumdare #47
description:
Hello adventurer,

and welcome to our candy factory.

I will make it short. Our machine is constantly breaking down and disrupting our progress. You have to pick up all the candy the machine spits out and throw it into the corresponding funnel.  

When the red light appears in the control panel, it means that there is a candy missing somewhere.

When you have cleared the room of all sweets, then progress will increase.

Control:

W: Forward

S: Backward

A: Left

D: Right

LEFT SHIFT:   Vertical fly down(Watch out not to glitch trough walls!)

SPACEBAR:    Vertical fly up (Watch out not to glitch trough walls!)

MOUSE MOVE: Rotate in all directions

MOUS CLICK:   Beam to pick up sweets (At close distance)

Things you should know:

The beam goes all the way to the floor, but you can only pick up sweets from a small distance.
Spacebar and Shift makes you glitch through walls. To get back in, go under the floor of the platform and hold spacebar pressed. If you glitch through the wall with a piece of candy do not let go of it or you will not be able to finish the game.

Due to lack of time I could not fix this thing.
